snippet: Time Warner Cable could be acquired by a smaller rival like Charter Communications, but the cable company could shift its fortunes by becoming the buyer, writes Jeffrey Goldfarb of Reuters Breakingviews.
abstract: Time Warner Cable could be acquired by a smaller rival like Charter Communications, but the cable company could shift its fortunes by becoming the buyer, writes Jeffrey Goldfarb of Reuters Breakingviews.

headline.main: How Time Warner Could Benefit by Turning the Tables
